overview:
In a world where tabloid celebrities rule the pop charts, indie phenomenon Ketsia comes as a true breath of fresh air. With her entirely real, come-as-you-are-attitude, a heartfelt lyrical voice, and an undeniably positive spirit, Ketsia is proving that you donâ€™t have to be industry-contrived to make great pop music thatâ€™s heard and appreciated.

With a rapidly increasing online presence, radio air play on Virgin 96 Montreal, Mix 103.7 Alberta, Hot 89.9 Ottawa, and Flow 93.5 Toronto, and sales of her single â€œQuand Je Tâ€™ai RencontrÃ©â€ on the verge of national Gold download status, Ketsia serves as a shining example of how independent artists with talent, distinct voices and perseverance can cut through the clutter of cookie-cutter music to reach fans worldwide.

Like Montreal, the city in which she was born and raised, Ketsiaâ€™s unique style draws on several cultural and musical influences: her Haitian heritage, her background as a child choral singer, and her singing and songwriting work in variety of genres (R&B, Pop, Hip-Hop, and Dance). All these are molded into a dance musical style that speaks to her personality (in both English and French): fun and infectious, at times bold, at times reflective, and always from the heart.

Her recently released debut album, â€œUne Reine Est NÃ©eâ€, showcases her wide musical background, from the undeniably rocky pulse of â€œLet It Goâ€ to the dance grooving â€œDown Pour Toiâ€. The album features an impressive list of contributions from Canadian talent including Vancouverâ€™s Ryan Stewart (Carly Rae Jepsen, Canadian Idol) and Russell Klyne (Nelly Furtado, K-OS), as well as MontrÃ©alâ€™s own Joe Barrucco (MC Mario, Samantha Fox, 3 JUNO-nominated tracks).

Unlike many Pop artists, Ketsia doesnâ€™t water down the integrity of her music. Nowhere is this more clear than in her live show, where she brings Barruccoâ€™s production to life through a rocking and grooving set, backed by the power of live guitars, basses, drums and a mother lode of funky keyboards and samplers. Ketsia is a proverbial â€œshow-stopperâ€ who genuinely loves performing, giving off a contagious enjoyment of being onstage, playing the music she loves. Watch for her to light up the stage this summer in hot spots across Canada!

While just getting started in her solo career, Ketsia has already grown a network of thousands of loyal fans and supporters online, and the numbers keep growing. Listen to her music online at www.ketsiamusic.com or www.myspace.com/ketsiamusic, and join the many thousands of supporters who have already become a member of Ketsiaâ€™s Facebook fan page. Ketsia can also be found on iLike, iTunes, Puretracks, and YouTube, where her music video â€œLet It Go (Remix)â€ has been viewed over 100,000 times.

If you havenâ€™t already, be sure to check out Ketsiaâ€™s new hit single â€œPossible.â€ Released in May 2010, â€œPossibleâ€ is generating tons of excitement online and in the media. Donâ€™t miss Ketsia on the centerfold of ME Magazineâ€™s summer 2010 issue as part of the magazineâ€™s â€œRising Starâ€ series. As well, inspired by the success of â€œPossible,â€ Ketsia has been spotlighted in Billboard Magazineâ€™s “Emerging Canadian Artists” section for June 2010, and has moved up to #9 on the chart for August 2010. Furthermore, Ketsia made her debut on Billboard Magazine’s “Hot 100” chart in August 2010, at #97 and is currently at #83.

Donâ€™t be the last to jump on the K-Train!

Facts about Ketsia:

Ketsia is on the RISE!!! Here are the facts: - 21, 000 Facebook fans. - #83 on Billboard Magazine’s “Hot 100” chart and #9 on Billboard Magazine’s”Emerging Canadian Artists” chart. - On the centerfold of ME Magazineâ€™s summer 2010 issue as part of the magazineâ€™s â€œRising Starâ€ series. - Has over 100, 000 YouTube views for her music video “Let It Go”. - On the verge of national gold download status with her last single, â€œPossibleâ€.

Ketsia Quotes:

“KETSIA finds anything is “Possible” - Paul Tuch, Billboard “Rising Star - KETSIA” - Matthew Peters, ME Magazine “InspirÃ©e de la tradition gospel et de lâ€™univers du Hip Hop, Ketsia est un nouveau talent sur la Pop montrÃ©alaise avec sa chanson, Quand je tâ€™ai rencontrÃ©.” - Francophonie Express
